bt.processor

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.processor.RoutingProcessingStage<C>

    C - Type of processing context

    ProcessingStage<C>

    TerminateOnErrorProcessingStage

    public abstract class RoutingProcessingStage<C extends ProcessingContext>
extends Object
implements ProcessingStage<C>
    Base class for chained processing stage implementations.

    1.3

        Next stage

      • doExecute

        protected abstract ProcessingStage<C> doExecute(C context,
                                                ProcessingStage<C> next)
        Execute current stage and calculate the next stage. In most cases the implementing class should just return the default next stage, that is passed as the second argument to this method. However, in some cases it can override the actual next stage, e.g. to switch to the exception path in case of a processing error.
        Parameters:
        context - Processing context
        next - Default next stage (usually statically configured in ProcessorFactory)
        Returns:
        Actual next stage
        Since:
        1.5
